required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Drug Use Investigation of Wellnara Tablet

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a regulatory post marketing surveillance in Japan, and it is a local prospective and observational study of patients who have received Wellnara for postmenopausal osteoporosis. The objective of this study is to assess safety and efficacy of using Wellnara in clinical practice. A total 400 patients will be recruited and followed 3 years since starting Wellnara administration.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reactions and serious adverse events in subject who received Wellnara
primary_outcome.time_frame: After Wellnara administration, up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reactions in subpopulation with baseline data (such as demographic data, concomitant disease) and dose of Wellnara
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and after Wellnara administration, up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Effectiveness evaluation assessment by the three rank scales: improvement, not changed, and worse
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and after Wellnara treatment, up to 3 years

intervention.description: Patients in daily life treatment receiving Wellnara for postmenopausal osteoporosis

study_pop.textblock: The target population of this study is patients who have received a prescription of Wellnara on the basis of the decision of the treating gynecologist. The study is expected to collect data of 400 patients in about 80 gynecological practices in Japan.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who received Wellnara for postmenopausal osteoporosis
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are contraindicated based on the product label
